findings.general: Most files in the analyzed categories (tool, adaptor, setup, about, configuration, archetype, dev-guide-*) are correctly categorized and do NOT need processing pattern categories. Processing patterns (FILE to DB, DB to DB, DB to FILE) are specific to batch processing implementation guidance.

files_needing_pattern_categories.file_path: nab-official/v6/nablarch-system-development-guide/Nablarchシステム開発ガイド/docs/nablarch-patterns/Nablarchバッチ処理パターン.md
files_needing_pattern_categories.reason: File explicitly discusses FILE to DB, DB to DB, and DB to FILE batch processing patterns. Contains detailed explanations of each pattern including input/output combinations, transaction management, and implementation guidance.
English version of the batch processing pattern document. Contains identical content about FILE to DB, DB to DB, and DB to FILE patterns.

category_analysis.description: Development tools including testing framework, static analysis, and toolbox utilities
category_analysis.reason: Tool documentation describes how to use development tools and testing frameworks. While some tools support batch testing, the tools themselves are not processing patterns.

category_analysis.reason: Adaptors are technical integration components, not processing patterns. They enable integration with libraries like Jackson, Jersey, Thymeleaf, etc.

conclusion.overall_assessment: The categorization is highly accurate. Out of 324 files reviewed, only 2 files need additional processing pattern categories.
key_findings: Tool, adaptor, setup, about, configuration, and archetype categories are correctly applied and should NOT have processing pattern categories
Most dev-guide-other files are correctly categorized without pattern categories
Only 2 files (Nablarchバッチ処理パターン.md and its English version) need processing pattern categories added
These files explicitly document FILE to DB, DB to DB, and DB to FILE batch processing patterns with detailed implementation guidance
Other batch-related files (setup guides, testing tools, overview docs) correctly do NOT have pattern categories as they don't teach processing patterns
conclusion.recommendation: Add pattern-file-to-db, pattern-db-to-db, and pattern-db-to-file categories to the 2 identified batch processing pattern documentation files.
